comment.author: 90171649@N00
comment._content: Given the circumstances, it's amazing how jolly everyone looks in the photo.

comment.author: 48889036733@N01
comment._content: John Schrank said that the assassinated William McKinley appeared to him in his dream, sitting up in his coffin, and pointed to Theodore Roosevelt as the man who had murdered him, and directed Schrank to avenge his death. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C00E2D6133CE633A... www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/21261
